description: SWOS420 OBS Scene — Browser source overlay for 24/7 autonomous league stream

sources.name: Background
sources.note: Dark background (rgba(10,12,17,1)). Replace with game footage when SWOS port is ready.

sources.name: Overlay Dashboard
sources.note: Main overlay — scoreboard, commentary, table. Reads JSON state from serve_overlay.py.

setup_instructions: 1. Start the overlay server:   python scripts/serve_overlay.py
2. Start the league stream:    python scripts/stream_league.py --pace 2.0
3. In OBS: Add Browser Source → URL: http://localhost:8420/overlay.html
4. Set resolution to 1920x1080, no custom CSS needed
